name: U.S. citizen and permanent resident research doctorate recipients, by major field of doctorate, ethnicity, and race: 2023
description: U.S. citizen and permanent resident research doctorate recipients, by major field of doctorate, ethnicity, and race: 2023

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_all_u_s_citizens_and_permanent_residents_number_
variableMeasured.description: All U S Citizens And Permanent Residents Number

variableMeasured.name: field_u_s_citizen_or_permanent_resident_hispanic_or_latino
variableMeasured.description: U S Citizen Or Permanent Resident Hispanic Or Latino

variableMeasured.name: field_u_s_citizen_or_permanent_resident_not_hispanic_or_latino_american_indian_or_alaska_native
variableMeasured.description: U S Citizen Or Permanent Resident Not Hispanic Or Latino American Indian Or Alaska Native

variableMeasured.description: U S Citizen Or Permanent Resident Not Hispanic Or Latino Asian

variableMeasured.name: field_u_s_citizen_or_permanent_resident_not_hispanic_or_latino_black_or_african_american
variableMeasured.description: U S Citizen Or Permanent Resident Not Hispanic Or Latino Black Or African American

variableMeasured.name: field_u_s_citizen_or_permanent_resident_not_hispanic_or_latino_other_race_or_race_not_reported

variableMeasured.name: field_u_s_citizen_or_permanent_resident_ethnicity_not_reported
variableMeasured.description: U S Citizen Or Permanent Resident Ethnicity Not Reported

notes: Due to rounding, percentages may not sum to 100. Beginning in 2021, a modified version of the 2020 Classification of Instructional Programs (CIP) codes was used in the survey data collection, and new broad, major, and detailed fields are used in tables reporting data from 2021 to the present; see the field list in table A-4. Therefore, the field of doctorate data prior to 2021 may not be comparable to subsequent years. For more information about the 2021 taxonomy change, see the "Technical Notes."
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Earned Doctorates.
